ProductInfo.Features:

<7> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <8> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
